ref: 8738 *prarikta ʻ empty, left ʼ. [práricyatē ʻ becomes empty ʼ TS. -- √ric]
Kho. pirtak ʻ sterile (of animals and women), not giving milk (of cows) ʼ;
Mth. partā ʻ land left fallow ʼ;
Bi. parīt, partī ʻ waste land, land left fallow ʼ, partā ʻ land accidentally gone out of cultivation ʼ (= parāt, ˚rã̄t, ˚rātā of which -- ā -- is unexpl.). -- See *prarēcyatē.
